name.description: The name of the Minio service

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Minio node

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each Minio node

region.description: The account region where Minio data is located

access_key.description: Access key that can be used to log into Minio Server

secret_key.description: Secret access key that can be used to log into Minio Server

storage.description: Storage configuration for Minio's application and config on DC/OS

local-volumes.description: Local volumes configuration (only used if external persistent volumes are disabled). Local volumes are created on the machine with the hostname specified and Marathon will attempt to re-launch the task on the same machine. Note that if the machine is lost, your data may also be lost.

pinned-hostname.description: An optional DC/OS agent hostname to run this Minio instance on (e.g. 10.0.0.1). If this is not specified then the task may relaunch on another node than the one it originally ran on.

host-volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting Minio configuration and data.

external-volumes.description: External persistent volumes configuration. External persistent volumes are a DC/OS feature that allow your data to be migrated with your task.

enabled.description: Whether to use DC/OS external volumes to persist Minio state. By default, this is false.

networking.description: Networking-related configuration properties for Minio on DC/OS.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

https-redirect.description: Whether Marathon-lb should redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS. This requires 'virtual-host' to be set. By default, this is false.
